column2: "Well, you seem to be sticking at it, hm? I've been hearing about your hard work all over."
"So, how about showing me some of that skill?"
"Have you heard about Time Attack? Basically, it's about racing the clock to try and set a good time."
"Go ahead and do whatever you can to finish this exercise as fast as possible. The difficulty doesn't matter."
"Set a record, get a reward. What have you got to lose?"
